data.title: Sodagreen's three-year hiatus is coming to an end, why can't you wait? - hotcomm
data.meta_description: On the evening of September 24th,  soda green  posted a post on social networking sites to announce that it is about to return.....    Friendship is so precious,So enviable again
data.text:
On the evening of September 24th, soda green posted a post on social networking sites to announce that it is about to return.

tweeted: "Hello friends from all over the universe, we are Soda Green!"

Once the news was released, Soda Green fans were excited.

On January 1, 2017, Sodagreen held the final concert of the group's break in Taipei. After singing the song "When We Walk Together", Wu Qingfeng said:

"All pain and all Thank you for walking with Soda Green, and when we come back, thank you."

When the final night of " singer 2019 " had not yet announced the singing guest, many people thought that Wu Qingfeng was going to be in Changsha, Hunan. The Soda Green members gathered together and announced their return on the same stage.

As a result, Wu Qingfeng himself announced the name of the guest " Jolin Tsai ". The "peak blowing machine" that can hold the queen can naturally stabilize the media and fans. He took the initiative to tell the outside world: We are very defensive. As promised, three years is three years, and it's almost time!

yeah.

Since January 2, 2017, when the group announced a three-year break, Sodagreen, a musical group that once called for wind and rain, has really faded out of the public eye for more than a thousand days.

These days, the six Sodagreen people are like "those flowers" scattered all over the world, and finally have time to do their own business.

Some people continue their studies, some people get married with children.

Only the lead singer Wu Qingfeng chose to run out by himself, terminated the contract with his former manager, set up a company by himself, continued to sing as a singer, and enjoyed his solo.

This splendid ensemble contains so many good memories.

In middle school, many people played sodagreen songs in their headphones.

You know that even if the heavy rain turns the city upside down, I will hug you and I can't stand seeing your back and come to write down my grievances that are hard to endure every second

included in the album "Small Universe" "Little Love Song" may be many people's first impression of soda green.

Since then, their fresh and artistic feeling has been lingering in my mind, and those simple melodies can always gently flow into the hearts of listeners.

In 2006, Sodagreen released the album "Small Universe", and this lively band really entered the public.

Then in 2007, they won the 19th Golden Melody Award Best Orchestra and the 8th Chinese Music Media Award Best Band and many other awards.

In the following years, Sodagreen has released a number of albums, all of which have achieved good results.

Among them, they spanned six years, and they completed four albums with the theme of "spring, summer, autumn and winter", which were liked by both sides of the strait.

dozens of songs,Warm as sunlight, enthusiasm as fanaticism, sadness as a story, solemn as never before.

Among them, there are naturally many popular classics.

" he has summer in the summer" "after saying goodbye" " I miss you so much" " he raised his right hand to call "...

Every youth-related In the days, there are always soda green songs to walk with us.

At each awards ceremony, they always take away one honor after another.

In 2016, they won the " 27th Taiwan Golden Melody Awards " Best Lyricist Award for their song "He Raised His Right Hand for Calling", and won the Best Orchestra Award and Best Arrangement with Soda Green Song Artist Award and many other awards.

This year, they really became popular in the entire music scene, and it has been 12 years since their debut.

As they sang in "A Moment in Ten Years":

may be busy and busy, may be hurt and hurt

may have countless tears sang and sang at night

but in exchange for growth, in exchange for hope

Now I'm standing on the stage and they tell you

Ten years of work have become a brilliant one minute dream

About the name of the band, The strange name does not have any deep meaning,Purely because the members felt that "soda" was a good way to describe their music.

After the drummer Serena proposed a three-character name, it would become popular. The lead singer Qingfeng said that it is better to add his favorite green, and the name "Soda Green" was decided on this.

Participated in the Ocean Music Festival in 2003, originally intended as the band's last performance before disbanding.

But by coincidence, the music producer Lin Weizhe who was watching the audience took a glance and signed the band decisively, and then they became the best partners in music, as close as family members.

In the case of not being favored by friends in the circle, Lin Weizhe not only sold the house to release the album for Soda Green, but also did not make any changes to their music, completely respecting and retaining their original style.

△Lin Weizhe on the left, Wu Qingfeng on the right

Slowly, they were recognized by more and more people.

Once, at the concert, Wu Qingfeng burst into tears and sighed with emotion:

Before, many people disliked us, many people said that our teacher Wei Zhe was crazy, but today we finally stand here, proving that teacher Wei Zhe did not Crazy.

Wu Qingfeng once said: "Music and singing are enough in my life."

, Everyone thought that he was really going to quit Soda Green. This question was answered again in this year's "Singer 2019" interview: I chose to sing just to make myself stronger.

Faye Wong once said that her biggest trouble is being too red,Wu Qingfeng also said something similar: "I'm being chased by inspiration, it's so annoying."

In the music world, Wu Qingfeng is one of the top creative talents.

The well-informed diva Zhang Huimei is amazed at his creative ability.

Whether it was the soda green period or the personal period now, he has created too many excellent works by himself.

Moreover, he also wrote songs for Rene Liu , Eason Chan , Angela Chang and many other singers.

It is said that Lin Youjia once invited Wu Qingfeng to sing, and the song was sent. Just three hours later, Lin Youjia got the lyrics full of praise.

's creative ability has always been a major aspect of Wu Qingfeng's praise. In the face of various reputations, Wu Qingfeng said:

"There is no genius, just work in peacetime.

When

was an artist, no matter how busy he was, he never stopped reading.

When reading a book, he would come up with some understandings of his own, and he would annotate and annotate these understandings in the book, and wait until his spare time In a little taste.

It is said that when he was very young, his grandfather trained him to calligraphy, and he already knew a lot of characters at a young age.

At that time, he still liked He listens to classical music and likes to listen to all kinds of CDs.

Moreover, he not only listens, but also goes to the library to find the commentary of the corresponding song,To understand what the music is saying.

△ When Wu Qingfeng was a child

After middle school, he has been engaged in editing work intermittently.

High school, he used to be the editor of the school magazine.

During college vacations, he also edited Travel Weekly.

From childhood to adulthood, he has been dealing with words. After repeated studies, he gradually became sensitive to words. When writing songs, he was able to do it at his fingertips.

He wrote 9 songs in 2000 when he first started college, more than 40 in 2002 and 30 in 2003...

Every time he writes a song, he will brew all the emotions, Turn songs into poems.

Wu Qingfeng's efforts are not only for himself.

In the past fifteen years, Sodagreen has brought infinite power to fans all the time, so the members of Sodagreen have also gained more energy from each other than ever before.

As Wu Qingfeng said: The relationship between the six of us is that when you know that one person is working hard, everyone else will work hard together.

When Wu Qingfeng went to the United States to see members Liu Jiakai took a class and watched him from the very beginning of music theory.

Wu Qingfeng sighed with emotion: That majestic guitarist back then actually filled the paper with bean sprouts (notes)!

Wu Qingfeng was not only moved, but also awakened himself: hey, I should study too, I want to become stronger, because the end of the three-year hiatus is coming.

Friendship is so precious,So enviable again.

Sometimes the unavoidable depression and heavy feeling of powerlessness will make people stray into the foggy forest, the cold wind and the unknown ahead make people doubt everything.

and grasping every moment of the present is the best way to improve yourself.

.
